function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Incorporate micro-level behaviors into the simulation and validate the accuracy of transmission scenarios","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enable high flexibility for customizing human behaviors and physical spaces within the simulation tool","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ensure that contextual information is embedded in the building model, such as environmental factors, social dynamics, and situational individual and group behaviors within the built environment.","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct a comprehensive assessment of ventilation systems, doors, shared spaces, layout, and furniture to understand and mitigate transmission risks.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air behaviors.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct research and studies to better understand the influence of behavior on disease spread. develop targeted policies and communication strategies to influence positive behavior change.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improving ventilation systems, implementing air filtration, and
